plan_steps: Step 1 (PLAN): I will gather the transaction data for the specified date range.
Step 2 (ACT): I will categorize the transactions into different categories such as online shopping, grocery shopping, transportation, and dining.
Step 3 (OBSERVE): I will analyze the transaction amounts and frequency to identify patterns and trends.
Step 4 (SUMMARIZE): I will summarize the findings and provide insights into the company's spending habits.
Step 5 (REFLECT): I will reflect on the analysis and provide recommendations for cost-saving opportunities or adjustments to the company's financial strategy.
